p: The medications that block the virus replication include lopinavir-ritonavir combination and darunavir-cobicistat combination. The lopinavir-ritonavir combination is a fixed-dose medication for the prevention and treatment of HIV infection [ 137]. The cytochrome P450 inhibitory effects of ritonavir prolonged the half-life of Lopinavir and extended its protease inhibitory action on the HIV replications. The in-vitro studies suggested that the lopinavir/ritonavir combination can inhibit coronavirus replication.
